mapper.select: select img_url from student_equipment stuEq join equipment_expansion expan on stuEq.equipment_id = expan.equipment_id join equipment ment on ment.id = stuEq.equipment_id and stuEq.intensification_degree = expan.intensification_degree where stuEq.type = #{type} and ment.type = 1 and stuEq.student_id = #{studentId} limit 1
